医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
宫颈机能不全患者的宫颈成纤维细胞对黄体酮的反应受损《科学报告》中描述的研究强调了难治性宫颈机能不全 (CI) 患者的宫颈成纤维细胞对激素孕酮 (P4) 的反应受损。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Cervical-太多-in-cervical-insufficiency-病人-show-impaired-responses-to-progesterone.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Cervical-fascial-in-cervical-insufficiency-病人-show-impaired-responses-to-progesterone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2783d154-2d5f-4c4a-9b87-17a2a8fc0cd1 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 03:54:00 -0400 Cervical fibroblasts in cervical insufficiency patients show impaired responses to progesterone
异源加强方案与增强对严重的、与 omicron 相关的 COVID-19 结果的保护有关研究比较了不同的 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 疫苗接种方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Heterologous-booster-schedules-are-linked-with-increased-protection-against-severe-omicron-lated-COVID-19-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Heterologous-booster-schedules-are-linked-with-increased-protection-against-severe-omicron-lated-COVID-19-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30b7f372-d18f-404a-bde9-9c284846ead0 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 03:54:00 -0400 Heterologous booster schedules are associated with increased protection against severe, omicron related COVID-19 outcomes
监测急性淋巴细胞白血病治疗的新型药理学模型方法发表在《科学报告》上的这篇研究论文开发了儿童急性淋巴细胞白血病 (ALL) 维持治疗的药代动力学 (PK) 药效 (PD) 模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/A-novel-pharmacology-modeling-approach-to-monitor-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/A-novel-pharmacology-modeling-approach-to-monitor-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=787b37e5-60f4-4433-96c8-9b95efdbe19b Wed, 26 Jul 2023 03:39:00 -0400 A novel pharmacology modeling approach to monitor acute lymphoblastic leukemia treatment
肿瘤源性 GDF-15 抑制免疫治疗反应研究人员评估了肿瘤源性 GDF-15 对抗 PD-1 免疫疗法反应的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Tumor-衍生-GDF-15-suppresses-immunotherapy-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Tumor-衍生-GDF-15-suppresses-immunotherapy-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a402e81f-b316-43c3-b540-86d4c2720dd0 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 03:26:00 -0400 Tumor-derived GDF-15 suppresses immunotherapy response
积极的经历可以逆转老年认知能力下降一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（被 MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 的“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 13 期，题为“MSK1 is required for the Benefit synaptic and整个生命周期中丰富经验的认知效应。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/MSK1-retains-its-importance-in-converting-positive-experience-into-old-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/MSK1-retains-its-importance-in-converting-positive-experience-into-old-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dfae7e2-b75e-4b61-9f68-964a57aee12b Wed, 26 Jul 2023 02:29:00 -0400 Positive experiences can reverse cognitive decline in old age
低能蓝光脉冲仿生材料可以重塑受损的角膜渥太华大学研究人员及其合作者团队透露，由低能蓝光脉冲激活的可注射生物材料具有对眼睛圆顶外层进行现场修复的巨大潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Biomimetic-materials-pulsed-with-low-energy-blue-light-can-reshape-damaging-corneas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Biomimetic-materials-pulsed-with-low-energy-blue-light-can-reshape-damaging-corneas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d4b69a4-fd33-4e0b-8445-3a6c90b2f5b3 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 02:07:54 -0400 Biomimetic materials pulsed with low-energy blue light can reshape damaged corneas
父母过早死亡的长期影响的性别差异《流行病学与社区健康杂志》在线发表的一项大型长期研究的结果表明，过早失去父母对男孩的累积健康和经济影响可能比女孩更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Analyzing-worse-mental-health-and-lower-earnings-in-adulthood-for-both-sexes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Analyzing-worse-mental-health-and-lower-earnings-in-adulthood-for-both-sexes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ca670dd-9623-4464-bcb2-616c67a306ee Wed, 26 Jul 2023 01:56:00 -0400 Gender differences in long-term effects of premature parental death
解决患有心脏病的儿童的肥胖问题根据今天发表在欧洲心脏病学会 (ESC) 期刊《欧洲预防心脏病学杂志》上的心脏病和儿童肥胖专家的科学声明，童年是在肥胖造成的损害不可逆转之前解决肥胖问题的机会之窗。 ).1 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Tackling-obesity-in-children-with-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Tackling-obesity-in-children-with-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca5bbd0e-65ba-498e-99cd-9bfe262a9857 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 01:44:02 -0400 Tackling obesity in children with heart disease
专家呼吁为自身免疫性疾病患者提供紧急心理健康支持剑桥大学和伦敦国王学院的最新研究表明，超过一半的自身免疫性疾病患者患有抑郁或焦虑等心理健康问题，但大多数人在临床上很少或从未被询问过心理健康症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Experts-call-for-urgent-mental-health-support-for-autoimmune-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Experts-call-for-urgent-mental-health-support-for-autoimmune-disease-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac9cf24b-4a93-497f-be6b-efeac1fe042e Wed, 26 Jul 2023 01:43:05 -0400 Experts call for urgent mental health support for autoimmune disease patients
药物干扰素被证明可有效减少 COVID-19 的传播珀斯研究人员领导的一项创新临床试验的结果表明，药物干扰素可以帮助减少 COVID-19 从阳性者传播到其家庭接触者，该研究有助于为未来大流行的治疗选择提供信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Drug-interferon-proven- effective-to-reduce-the-spread-of-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Drug-interferon-proven- effective-to-reduce-the-spread-of-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f158e97-a226-416f-93f1-518694db6f01 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 01:17:47 -0400 Drug interferon proven effective to reduce the spread of COVID-19
